Enums/ByteToMessageDecoderVerifier/Verif.name: wrongProduction(actual:expected:)
Enums/ByteToMessageDecoderVerifier/Verif.abstract: The errorCode will be wrongProduction when the expected output didn’t match the actual

Enums/ByteToMessageDecoderVerifier/Verif.name: overProduction(_:)
Enums/ByteToMessageDecoderVerifier/Verif.abstract: The errorCode will be set to overProduction when a decoding result was yielded where

Enums/ByteToMessageDecoderVerifier/Verif.name: underProduction(_:)
Enums/ByteToMessageDecoderVerifier/Verif.abstract: The errorCode will be set to underProduction when a decoder didn’t yield output when output was

Enums/ByteToMessageDecoderVerifier/Verif.name: leftOversOnDeconstructingChannel(inbound:outbound:pendingOutbound:)
Enums/ByteToMessageDecoderVerifier/Verif.abstract: The errorCode will be set to leftOversOnDeconstructionChannel if there were left-over items

Enums/ByteToMessageDecoderVerifier/Verif.name: inputs
Enums/ByteToMessageDecoderVerifier/Verif.abstract: Contains the inputs that were passed to the ByteToMessageDecoder at the point where it failed

Enums/ByteToMessageDecoderVerifier/Verif.name: errorCode
Enums/ByteToMessageDecoderVerifier/Verif.abstract: errorCode describes the concrete problem that was detected.

Enums/ByteToMessageDecoderVerifier.html#.name: verifyDecoder(inputOutputPairs:decoderFactory:)
Enums/ByteToMessageDecoderVerifier.html#.abstract: Verifies a ByteToMessageDecoder by performing a number of tests.

Enums/ByteToMessageDecoderVerifier/Verif.name: VerificationError
Enums/ByteToMessageDecoderVerifier/Verif.abstract: A VerificationError is thrown when the verification of a ByteToMessageDecoder failed.
